==============
Mercurial-LITF
==============


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/mercurial_litf.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/mercurial_litf

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/Lothiraldan/mercurial_litf.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.org/Lothiraldan/mercurial_litf

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/mercurial-litf/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://mercurial-litf.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




Mercurial LITF is a LITF compatible Mercurial test runner


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://mercurial-litf.readthedocs.io.
